title: TelegraphBot
description: Bot informations are stored in database inside a telegraph_bots table and can be retrieved using DefStudio\Telegraph\Models\TelegaphBot model or using a custom Bot model.

children.value: Bot informations are stored in database inside a
table and can be retrieved using
model or using a custom Bot model.
To customize on your own Bot model, make sure that your custom model extends the

props.code:
<?php

namespace App\Models;

use DefStudio\Telegraph\Models\TelegraphBot as BaseModel;

class Bot extends BaseModel
{

}

children.value: You should specify the class name of your model in the
key of the telegraph config file.
retrieves the bot information from Telegraph APIs

props.code:
/** @var \DefStudio\Telegraph\Models\TelegraphBot $telegraphBot */

$telegraphBot->info();


/*
id: xxxxx
is_bot: true
first_name: telegraph-test
username: my_test_bot
can_join_groups: true
can_read_all_group_messages: false
supports_inline_queries: false
*/

children.value: register commands in Telegram Bot in order to display them to the user when the "/" key is pressed

send back the results for an inline query
